article_title: Gov. Haslam strikes defiant tone toward critics of gas tax hike

article_metadata.description: SHELBYVILLE, Tenn. -- Gov. Bill Haslam has a defiant message for groups lining up to oppose him on efforts to raise Tennessee's gas tax for the first time in 25 years:
